summary: Implements a custom diffusion pipeline that generates new variations of an input image (optionally guided by text) by encoding the image with CLIP models, projecting the embeddings, and decoding them through a conditional UNet followed by multi‑stage super‑resolution, all coordinated by specialized schedulers. Includes a helper for spherical linear interpolation of latent vectors.
business_intent: Demonstrates how to leverage UnCLIP technology for creative image editing and content generation, enabling developers to build AI‑powered tools for image variation, design iteration, and visual content creation.
